item.title: Integrate Open edX with Sentry
item.description: Setting up Sentry crash reporting if you want to provide a reliable service, itâ€™s extremely important to be aware of when things are going wrong on the website. Sentry is a wonderful free system to catch Python exceptions. For Django on Open edX, we use sentry-sdk to catch and report the errors back to Sentry. Set up a Sentry server or use existing Sentry . Set up two new services (LMS and Studio) in Sentry and get their DSN strings.

item.title: Kafka Consumer on Sentry Receives OFFSET_OUT_OF_RANGE Error
item.description: Stop your sentry instance docker-compose stop Then remove volumes docker-compose down --volumes Remove the Kafka & Zookeeper related volumes docker volume rm sentry-kafka docker volume rm sentry-zookeeper Run installation script again which will create the missing topics ./install.sh --skip-commit-check Then start your sentry instance docker-compose up -d
